role.argrole: goal, end condition - marked with الى

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ادت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM ردود) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفعل))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الغاضبة))) (PP-CLR (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تأجيج) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مشاعر)) (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مناوئة) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN لمسلمين))))))) (PUNC .)

arg.g: to flame adverse feelings against the Muslims
